tool.name: xpore-diffmod
tool.command:
printf "notes: Pairwise comparison without replicates with default parameter setting.

" >> config.yml && printf "data:
" >> config.yml && printf " ${control_name}:
" >> config.yml && #for $i, $s in enumerate($ControlReplicates): printf " rep${i}: ./${control_name}_${i}
" >> config.yml && mkdir $control_name_${i} && ln -s ${s.ControlJson} $control_name_${i}/data.json && ln -s ${s.ControlIndex} $control_name_${i}/data.index && ln -s ${s.ControlReadcount} $control_name_${i}/data.readcount && ln -s ${s.ControlEventalign} $control_name_${i}/eventalign.index && #end for printf " ${test_name}:
" >> config.yml && #for $i, $s in enumerate($TestReplicates): printf " rep${i}: ./${test_name}_${i}
" >> config.yml && mkdir $test_name_${i} && ln -s ${s.TestJson} $test_name_${i}/data.json && ln -s ${s.TestIndex} $test_name_${i}/data.index && ln -s ${s.TestReadcount} $test_name_${i}/data.readcount && ln -s ${s.TestEventalign} $test_name_${i}/eventalign.index && #end for printf "
out: ./out
" >> config.yml && printf "
method:
" >> config.yml && printf " prefiltering:
" >> config.yml && printf " method: t-test
" >> config.yml && printf " threshold: 0.1
" >> config.yml &&
xpore-diffmod --config config.yml --n_processes \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4} && tree . && sed -i "s/,/	/g" .out/diffmod.table

param.name: control_name
param.label: Control condition name
param.help: Only letters, digits and _ will be retained in this field

param.name: test_name
param.label: Test condition name
param.help: Only letters, digits and _ will be retained in this field

tool.help:
**What it does**
Creates a tar.gz archive of fast5 (h5) sequences files
.. class:: warningmark
This tools follows a "map-reduce" procedure: multiple inputs, that can be arranged as a data collection, are compressed into a single tar.gz archive.
**Output**
A fast5.tar.gz archive
